title: V/H/S/2
review: This earlier V/H/S is not as inventive, interesting or fun as the newer ones. The lower budget resulted in most of the segments taking place in similar looking suburban houses. There was a good winged goat demon in it briefly. It ends with a montage of all the crazy parts duing the credits, as though it's trying to remind you about all the fun you had watching, but it didn't convince me.
